description: Chai tea is one of the most delicious teas that any tea drinker can have today. However, for those that are looking for more in terms of taste and comforting effects, it may not be enough. Fortunately, we have a simple tweak for the famous chai tea that will surely surprise you with its taste, especially because the recipe is very simple.
name: Autumn Chai Swizzle
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp. Sugar or any sweetener of your choice

recipeInstructions.name: Brew your chai tea and add the sweetener of your choice.
recipeInstructions.text: Brew your chai tea and add the sweetener of your choice.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the Irish cream into a coffee mug and mix the chai tea in it.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the Irish cream into a coffee mug and mix the chai tea in it.

recipeInstructions.name: Stir with the cinnamon stick to impart its flavor to your drink. You can leave it in the mug to serve as garnish.
recipeInstructions.text: Stir with the cinnamon stick to impart its flavor to your drink. You can leave it in the mug to serve as garnish.
